sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence.data

Class ListenerPersistenceData

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence.data.AbstractListenerRegistration
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence.data.ListenerPersistenceData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, AnnotableRegistration, ListenerRegistration, MarkableRegistration, Registration, RegistrationMarker<ListenerPersistenceData>, SerializedListenerData, Annotable

    public final class ListenerPersistenceData
extends AbstractListenerRegistration
implements MarkableRegistration, RegistrationMarker<ListenerPersistenceData>, java.io.Serializable, SerializedListenerData
    Markable listener registration with lively updated registration status.

    Note: This implementation is truly serializable if and only if the underlying listener is serializable. Otherwise this implementation serializes listener's data necessary to obtain the listener from the core listener provider after deserialization at runtime.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
